explains: n. 死记硬背；习惯的过程，机械式的过程
wordGroup: rote memorization 死记硬背；机械背诵

sentences.en: He is very sceptical about the value of rote learning.
sentences.cn: 他十分怀疑死记硬背学习的价值。

sentences.en: His poor method of learning by rote made him unable to deal with the problems in his work flexibly.
sentences.cn: 他死记硬背的学习方法使他在工作中不能灵活处理问题。

sentences.en: They say, oh, this is rote learning.
sentences.cn: 他们说，哦，这是死记硬背啊。
